author: JAMIE STENGLE
title: EXPLAINER: What does Texas' data on abortions say about law?
description: DALLAS (AP) — Texas has released data showing a marked drop in abortions at clinics in the state in the first month under the nation's strictest abortion law, but that only tells part of the story.
